head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MAAS, BERNARD HENRY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MAAS, BERNARD HENRY

block.p: MAAS-Bernard Henry. Of Upper Montclair, on May 13, 2000. Beloved husband of Anna Mae (DeStefano) Maas, loving father of Bernard Gordon Maas. A Funeral Mass will be offered on Wednesday at St. Cassian's Church, Upper Montclair, at 10 AM. Visiting Caggiano Memorial, 62 Grove St, Montclair, on Monday 7-9 PM, Tuesday 2-4 and 7-9 PM.
